coreAttributes.name: Awakened Rhongomyniad
coreAttributes.description: Awakened Rhongomyniad is regarded as the "spear of the end", the light of destruction coming down from the heavens.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Deliver a pierceing blow to [npc2.name] with Rhongomyniad.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] holy Lance at [npc.her] side from the aether, so that [npc.she] may strike with it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(sheath)] [npc.her] holy lance away into the aether.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] leap upward high into the air with the holy lance radiating a powerful arcane energy trailing behind [npc.Name]. At the summet of your ascent you aim the lance down at you opponent and [npc.verb(pierce)] the sky downwards, striking the ground with a blinding light. [npc.Name] look up satisfied to see [npc2.name] knocked backwards!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] holy lance, [npc.name] [npc.verb(smile)] playfully as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the lance catches [npc2.her] unprepared!

[npc.Name] leap forwards and quickly close in upon [npc2.name] [npc.verb(Piercing)] [npc.her] with the holy lance, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrusts)] [npc.her] holy lance at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] holy lance, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] holy lance, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
